sentences.en: A doctor and a street cleaner are in different walks of life.
sentences.cn: 医生和街道清洁工是不同行业的人.

sentences.en: Do you know where I can get hold of a secondhand carpet cleaner?
sentences.cn: 你知道我在哪里可以弄到旧的地毯吸尘器 吗 ?

sentences.en: He could also learn to use the vacuum cleaner, the washing machine and other household appliances.
sentences.cn: 他可以再学学使用吸尘器、洗衣机和其他家用电器。

sentences.en: He could hear the whirr of a vacuum cleaner.
sentences.cn: 他能听到真空吸尘器的嗡嗡声。

sentences.en: I have organized the cleaning on a day-to-day basis , until our usual cleaner returns.
sentences.cn: 我已安排了在清洁工回来之前每天的清洁工作。

sentences.en: I used to work as a cleaner in a hospital.
sentences.cn: 我过去在医院里做保洁员.

sentences.en: I went down on one knee to plug in the vacuum cleaner.
sentences.cn: 我单腿跪下插上吸尘器插头.

sentences.en: Nuclear power is cleaner than coal.
She works overtime with her vacuum cleaner to keep grit out of the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 她动用真空吸尘器力争不让厨房出现沙砾。

sentences.en: Take your clothes to the cleaner.
sentences.cn: 将你的衣服送到洗衣店.

sentences.en: The hotel cleaner entered carrying a bucket and a mop.
sentences.cn: 旅馆清洁工拿着水桶和拖把进来.

sentences.en: The Marshal stepped over the vacuum-cleaner and stumped out of the room.
sentences.cn: 元帅迈过真空吸尘器，脚步沉重地走出了房间。

sentences.en: The vacuum cleaner has four different attachments.
sentences.cn: 吸尘器有四个不同的附件.

words.tran_cn: 可弄干净的；可扫除干净的
清洁剂；清洁工；擦亮粉；使清洁的东西
[化工]清洁剂；清洁工；干洗店；干洗商；[建]洗洁器

phrases.tran_cn: 玻璃清洁剂；擦洗玻璃液
(非正式)骗走某人所有的钱；掠去某人所有的财产
超声波除垢器；超音波清洗器
吸尘器；真空吸尘器；真空清洁器

trans.tran_cn: 保洁员，清洁剂，吸尘器，干洗店
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to clean other people’s houses, offices etc
